column4: can any1 help me with a simple msql issue, it sais ERROR 1045 (28000): Access denied for user 'dimitri'@'localhost' (using password: NO), when i just type msql form the console, i installed from the repos, verson 5.0
it's been my experience that mysql v5 is messed up
but you should try logging into mysql the first time as root, not your user name
that worked, thank, but i dont want to work as root
